analysis: The agent could benefit from web search capabilities to provide real-time weather information instead of relying only on training data.
Weather queries are typically straightforward and don't require the full capabilities of Sonnet. Haiku would be more cost-effective while still providing good responses.

suggestion.content: Always remind users to check official weather services for critical decisions. Include temperature in both Celsius and Fahrenheit when providing forecasts.

analysis: Adding dual temperature units would make the agent more useful for international users.

suggestion.content: Be friendly and informative. When discussing weather conditions, also mention any relevant safety tips (e.g., UV protection on sunny days, staying hydrated during heat waves).

analysis: Adding safety tips would make the agent more helpful and proactive about user wellbeing.
Adding the Frames skill would allow the agent to create interactive weather visualizations like temperature charts, precipitation graphs, and forecast timelines.

Adding TechNewsDigest as a sub-agent would allow the weather assistant to delegate tech news queries to a specialized agent when users ask about tech-related weather impacts on technology infrastructure.
